name: SuperClaude Debug
tagline: Root cause analysis and debugging using two SuperClaude specialists
description: Root cause analysis and debugging using two SuperClaude specialists â€” analyzer (systematic evidence-based root cause investigation) and testing-strategist (reproduction test design and regression prevention). Returns a diagnosis with a targeted fix and test plan.

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
